document_data.name: ''Staff of Command''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''staff of command''''' was a [[magic item]] capable of influencing others.
document_data.Powers:
''Staves of command'' had three functions and were most effective if wielded by [[cleric]]s since they had access to all three powers. The staff granted the wielder the ''[[charm person]]'' and ''[[suggestion]]'' abilities to be used against [[human]]s. Against animals the staff granted the ''[[ring of mammal control|mammal control]]'' ability if used by a wizard and the ''[[potion of animal control|animal control]]'' ability if used by a cleric. Lastly, clerics were able to control plant life within a {{SI|10|ft}} square.

Each use of the staff depleted a single charged. ''Staves of command'' could be recharged.
document_data.Notable Owners: [[Gina bint Kemala]], a [[Mystic (Zakhara)|mystic]] from [[Huzuz]], carried a ''staff of command''.{{cite book/City of Delights/Golden Huzuz|55-56}}
